item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 27, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I got laid off from Meta and created a minor hit on Steam (811 points | 200 comments)
2. Winners of the $10k ISBN visualization bounty (206 points | 14 comments)
3. Electronic devices used for car thefts set to be banned (33 points | 35 comments)

7. iMac G4(K) (215 points | 92 comments)
8. Fortune(6) – Linux Man Page (30 points | 10 comments)

23. DARPA Large Bio-Mechanical Space Structures (158 points | 65 comments)

25. Gambling on papal conclaves (31 points | 12 comments)
26. Writing a .NET Garbage Collector in C# – Part 1 (58 points | 7 comments)
27. Show HN: I created a language called AntiLang – breaking all the conventions (88 points | 44 comments)
28. Rediscovering Quaternions (88 points | 51 comments)
29. Long division verified via Hoare logic (76 points | 44 comments)
30. The Miserable State of Modems and Mobile Network Operators (142 points | 39 comments)
